attachments.title: How I'm able to take notes in mathematics lectures using LaTeX and Vim
attachments.text: A while back I an­swered a ques­tion on Quora: Can peo­ple ac­tu­al­ly keep up with note-​taking in Math­e­mat­ics lec­tures with LaTeX. There, I ex­plained my work­flow of tak­ing lec­ture notes in LaTeX using Vim and how I draw fig­ures in Inkscape. How­ev…
attachments.fallback: How I'm able to take notes in mathematics lectures using LaTeX and Vim

elements.text: If you're new to that world then you should check out this excellent blog post

text: You know, I found this article and read it a long time ago and thought it was too much for my workflow. Now, re-reading it, it is awesome and handy! Excited to try my hand at making a few new snippets. Thank you for showing this to me <@UAQLHMSN7> - super appreciated friend. :heart: :vim:
